suite.name: Build Sanity

test.name: Verify the correct credentials

kw.name: Open Browser For Test
kw.doc: This keyword is used to open login page in browser.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Enter Login Credentials
kw.doc: This keyword is used to enter the values in the fields of Username and Password.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click On Button
kw.doc: This keyword is used to click on buttons on webpage.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

kw.name: End Test
kw.doc: This keyword is used to capture screenshot of page whenever test-case fails.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.
